name: Sergeant Andrews²
descriptions: Sergeant Andrews is an NCR soldier captured by Caesar's Legion. A male Courier can fight him in the Legion arena at The Fort.
Andrews was captured alive by a Legion raiding party and was brought back to the Fort to fight in the arena. Before the Courier arrives, Andrews has already been challenged once and survived.
Despite being killed with a machete, Andrews, like all other NCR sergeants, does not count toward the Gun Runners' Arsenal challenge Armed For Bear.
